About.aboutText:
Simmortals is a thoughtful technology platform designed to support you through loss — helping you honour, preserve, and carry forward the memory of those who’ve passed.

By blending emotional sensitivity with the tools of the digital age, Simmortals opens a new chapter in remembrance. From precise location technology to meaningful acts of social good, it reimagines how individuals, families, and communities navigate grief and memory.

Simmortals is a new ritual of remembrance — where tradition meets innovation, where personal loss finds shared meaning, and where memories are carried gently into the future.

<bold>Because what we remember lives on.</bold>
About.purposeText: To protect memories with care, support emotional journeys through technology, and honour the legacy of every life with dignity.
About.promiseText: To create a timeless digital sanctuary where grief meets grace — and where memories become bridges between hearts, cultures, and generations.

connection.title: Connection
connection.description: We design technology that brings people, memories, and generations closer. Every connection we build is a thread in the fabric of collective remembrance.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We design technology that brings people, memories, and generations closer. Every connection we build is a thread in the fabric of collective remembrance.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.description: We craft experiences that feel—visually, emotionally, eternally. By blending design with memory, we shape how people connect to the stories that matter most.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: We believe legacy is a shared responsibility. By protecting stories and giving back to the world that shapes them, we create space for meaning to grow.

protection.title: Protection
protection.description: We ensure memories remain alive for generations and stay accessible through secure systems.

whatIsSimmortals.question: What is Simmortals?
whatIsSimmortals.answer: Simmortals is a respectful digital platform designed to help you honor loved ones. It offers a meaningful space to preserve memories, share stories, and create lasting connections that span generations.

whatIsMemorialPage.question: What is a Memorial Page?
whatIsMemorialPage.answer: A Memorial Page is a dedicated digital space where a loved one's life is remembered through photos, stories, messages, and tributes. It serves as a living memory for friends and family to visit, contribute to, and reflect upon.

whoCanUse.question: Who can use Simmortals?
whoCanUse.answer: Anyone who wishes to commemorate a loved one, preserve their legacy, or stay connected to memories can use Simmortals.

howToCreate.question: How do I create a Memorial Page?
howToCreate.answer: After signing up on the platform, simply click "Create a Memorial" to begin. You'll be guided through adding photos, videos, stories, and more to build a personalized page.

isFree.question: Is it free to create a Memorial Page?
isFree.answer: Yes. Creating a Memorial Page is completely free. We also offer premium plans with additional features and design options.

whoCanContribute.question: Who can contribute to a Memorial Page?
whoCanContribute.answer: Anyone can share a memory, condolence message, or media. All submissions are subject to the approval of the page administrator.

howLongActive.question: How long does a Memorial Page stay active?
howLongActive.answer: Memorial Pages remain live unless removed by the person who created them. Also, Simmortals reserves the right to remove Memorial pages upon complaint reports.

arePublic.question: Are Memorial Pages public?
arePublic.answer: By default, Memorial Pages are public and searchable. However, premium users can adjust privacy settings to keep pages private or share only with specific people.

howToReport.question: How can I report unwanted content?
howToReport.answer: Click "Report" to submit a complaint, briefly stating your reason.

whatHappensReported.question: What happens if inappropriate content or memorial pages are reported?
whatHappensReported.answer: Reports regarding specific content are reviewed by the page administrator, who may remove the content. If the report concerns a memorial page, the Simmortals moderation team will evaluate it. Pages that violate the platform's ethical guidelines or terms of use will be removed.

howModerated.question: How is content on memorial pages moderated?
howModerated.answer: All contributions are subject to the approval of the page administrator. The administrator has full discretion to accept, reject, or remove any shared content.

premiumFeatures.question: What features come with Premium Plans?
premiumFeatures.answer:
Premium users gain access to advanced tools to enhance and personalize Memorial Pages, including:

• Customized Memorial link
• Only with the link access option
• Animated photo enhancements
• Custom frame design
• Personalized digital flowers and candles
• SimmTag® for assigning location
• SimmTag® products for Tombstone integration
• Background music options
• Life story timeline embellished with memories
• AI-generated voice clone

howToPay.question: How can I pay?
howToPay.answer: You can securely complete your purchase using a credit or debit card. Subscriptions are available monthly or annually.

howToCancel.question: How do I cancel my Premium subscription?
howToCancel.answer: Go to your profile and manage subscriptions. You can cancel anytime from there.

whatHappensCancel.question: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
whatHappensCancel.answer: Your Memorial Page will switch to the free version. Premium features will be disabled, but your page will remain live and accessible. You can reactivate your plan at any time.

whatAreDigitalTributes.question: What are digital flowers and candles?
whatAreDigitalTributes.answer: These are symbolic digital gestures that visitors can leave on a Memorial Page — much like placing flowers or lighting a candle at a physical resting place.

whoCanLeave.question: Who can leave memories or condolence messages?
whoCanLeave.answer: Any visitor can request to post a tribute or message. All posts can be removed by the page owner discretion.

whatIsSimmTag.question: What is SimmTag® and how does it work?
whatIsSimmTag.answer: SimmTag® is a elegantly designed physical tag containing a QR code, placed at a loved one's resting place. When scanned, it directs visitors to their Memorial Page.

howToOrderSimmTag.question: How do I order a SimmTag®?
howToOrderSimmTag.answer: You can order a SimmTag® directly from the Simmortals Shop. Personalize it with a custom message and preview it before purchase.

whatDoesQRDo.question: What does the QR code on a Memorial Page do?
whatDoesQRDo.answer: The QR code can be linked to the exact grave location.

whatIsTimeline.question: What is the Life Story timeline?
whatIsTimeline.answer: It's a visual timeline that maps out important life events and memories with photos, notes, and videos — automatically generated for Premium Pages.

canShare.question: Can I share a Memorial Page on social media?
canShare.answer: Yes. Each Memorial Page has sharing options and buttons to easily post or send to others.

howToGetSupport.question: How can I get technical support?
howToGetSupport.answer: Visit <link>contact</link> page and fill out the support form. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

howToDeletePage.question: How do I delete a Memorial Page?
howToDeletePage.answer: Navigate to the page settings and select "Delete Page" to remove it permanently.

howToDeleteAccount.question: How do I delete my account?
howToDeleteAccount.answer: Go to your profile settings and choose "Delete My Account." This will remove all associated data and pages.
